summary: Security deposit not returned after 45 days
details: I moved out on October 15th and still haven't received my $2,400 security deposit back. Landlord keeps saying 'it's coming' but won't give me a date. The apartment was left in perfect condition with photos to prove it. What's the legal deadline in Massachusetts?

summary: Landlord threatening eviction over late fee dispute
details: Paid rent 3 days late due to bank issue. Landlord charged $150 late fee but lease says $50. Now threatening eviction if I don't pay the full $150. Can they do this?

summary: Radiator leaking and damaging my furniture
details: The radiator in my bedroom has been leaking for two weeks. Already reported it twice. My dresser and rug are water damaged. Can I deduct repair costs from rent? Should I document everything?

summary: Heat turned off in December - emergency?
details: Building heat has been off for 2 days now. It's 28 degrees outside. Management says boiler parts are backordered. Using space heaters but electric bill will be insane. What are my rights here?

summary: Neighbor's dog barking all night - lease violation?
details: My upstairs neighbor got a dog last month and it barks constantly from midnight to 6am. I've complained to management twice but nothing changes. Is this a lease violation I can use to break my lease?

summary: Breaking lease early due to job relocation
details: Just got transferred to NYC for work, starting January 15. Lease runs through August. Landlord wants 3 months rent as penalty. Is there a standard formula or can I negotiate? Have been a good tenant for 2 years.

summary: Roommate moved out without notice - what now?
details: My roommate just left last week with no warning. We're both on the lease and rent is due in 5 days. I can't afford the full amount alone. What happens if I only pay my half? Can landlord help find a replacement?

summary: Landlord harassment - constant 'inspections'
details: Landlord has done 4 'inspections' this month alone, always finding something to complain about. Pretty sure they want me out so they can raise rent. This feels like harassment. How do I document and report this?

summary: $75 late fee on $1,800 rent - is this excessive?
details: My lease has a $75 late fee if rent is even 1 day late. That's over 4% of my rent! I was 2 days late once due to a holiday and got charged. Is there a legal limit on late fees in Boston?

summary: Notice to quit received - 14 days to respond?
details: Got a 14-day notice to quit for non-payment but I have proof I paid rent on time. Bank statement shows the check cleared. What's my next step? Do I need a lawyer immediately?

summary: Can landlord refuse ESA in no-pets building?
details: I have an emotional support animal letter from my therapist. Landlord says building is strictly no pets and won't make exceptions. Isn't this a fair housing violation? What documentation do I need?

summary: Water bill suddenly tripled - landlord error?
details: My water bill went from $40 to $120 this month with no change in usage. Building has shared meters and landlord calculates my portion. Suspect they made a mistake. How do I dispute this?

summary: Lease renewal terms seem unfair - 15% increase
details: My landlord just sent renewal terms with a 15% rent increase. Current rent is $2,200 and they want $2,530. Is there any rent control in Boston? Can I negotiate or should I just move?

summary: Landlord entering apartment without any notice
details: Came home twice this week to find things moved around. Pretty sure landlord has been entering while I'm at work. Lease says they can enter 'at any time' but that can't be legal right? Feeling very uncomfortable.

summary: [AMA] Housing attorney answering questions this Friday
details: I'm a licensed housing attorney in Massachusetts with 10 years experience. I'll be answering questions this Friday 2-4pm EST. Drop your questions below and I'll get to as many as I can!

summary: Roommate stopped paying their share - am I liable?
details: My roommate lost their job and hasn't paid rent for 2 months. We're both on the lease. The landlord is threatening eviction for non-payment. Can I be evicted even though I've paid my half? What are my options?

summary: Non-refundable pet deposit on top of security deposit?
details: Landlord wants $500 non-refundable pet deposit plus the regular security deposit. I thought all deposits had to be refundable in MA? Also the lease says no pets but then mentions pet deposit - confusing!

summary: Flat $200 utility fee seems way too high
details: My new lease has a flat $200/month utility fee that doesn't change based on usage. I live alone in a 1BR and barely use AC. Is there any way to challenge this or get actual metered billing?

summary: No heat for 5 days - landlord says wait for contractor
details: Our heating system broke last week and it's getting cold. Landlord keeps saying they're waiting for a contractor but it's been 5 days. The lease says I'm responsible for all repairs which seems wrong. What can I do?

summary: Reminder: security deposit deductions must be itemized
details: Sharing the Attorney General's checklist plus our internal template for move-out inspection photos. Please attach documentation if your deduction dispute escalates.
